dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev has congratulated Karol Tadeusz Nawrocki on his election as Poland's new president.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev has congratulated Karol Tadeusz Nawrocki on his election as Poland's new president.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has congratulated Karol Tadeusz Nawrocki on his election as President of Poland, according to a message from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, that's the guy who just won with, uh, 50.89% of the vote, wasn't it? A pretty tight race.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, that's the guy who just won with, uh, fifty point eight nine percent of the vote, wasn't it? A pretty tight race.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to official results, Nawrocki received 10,606,877 votes (50.89%), while his opponent, Warsaw mayor Rafal Trzaskowski, received 10,237,286 votes (49.11%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, barely over the 50% threshold. His opponent was Rafal Trzaskowski, the mayor of Warsaw.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, barely over the fifty percent threshold. His opponent was Rafal Trzaskowski, the mayor of Warsaw.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to official results, Nawrocki received 10,606,877 votes (50.89%), while his opponent, Warsaw mayor Rafal Trzaskowski, received 10,237,286 votes (49.11%).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's a bit of a political newcomer, isn't he? A historian, director of the Institute of National Remembrance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's a bit of a political newcomer, isn't he? A historian, director of the Institute of National Remembrance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 42-year-old Nawrocki is a historian, director of the Institute of National Remembrance, and a political newcomer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—42 years old, and his campaign was all about "Poland First." Big shift from the previous president, Andrzej Duda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactlyminus forty two years old, and his campaign was all about Poland First. Big shift from the previous president, Andrzej Duda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 42-year-old Nawrocki is a historian, director of the Institute of National Remembrance, and a political newcomer. Previously, the post of President of Poland was held by Andrzej Duda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Tokayev's message emphasized strengthening ties between Kazakhstan and Poland, which is interesting—seems like a diplomatic priority.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tokayev's message emphasized strengthening ties between Kazakhstan and Poland, which is interesting-seems like a diplomatic priority.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I reaffirm my readiness to work together to further strengthen the relations between Kazakhstan and Poland, which are developing in the spirit of traditional friendship and mutual understanding, the telegram stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. He mentioned wanting to work together on socio-economic development and improving people's well-being.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. He mentioned wanting to work together on socio-economic development and improving people's well-being.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I sincerely wish you success in implementing your planned initiatives aimed at ensuring the socio-economic development of the country and improving the well-being of its people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the election itself seemed pretty smooth, right? Only minor violations reported.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the election itself seemed pretty smooth, right? Only minor violations reported.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The head of the State Election Commission noted that the voting process was peaceful, with only a small number of violations recorded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the State Election Commission called it peaceful. But the Supreme Court still has to confirm everything within 30 days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the State Election Commission called it peaceful. But the Supreme Court still has to confirm everything within thirty days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The head of the State Election Commission noted that the voting process was peaceful, with only a small number of violations recorded. Under Polish law, the Supreme Court of Poland must confirm the validity of the election results within 30 days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So Nawrocki's not officially in until then. But once he is, he'll have a five-year term with some significant powers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So Nawrocki's not officially in until then. But once he is, he'll have a five-year term with some significant powers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Poland is elected for a five-year term.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Foreign policy influence, appointing the Prime Minister, even acting as commander-in-chief during war.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Foreign policy influence, appointing the Prime Minister, even acting as commander-in-chief during war.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The head of state influences foreign policy, appoints the Prime Minister and cabinet members, and acts as Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Polish Armed Forces in wartime.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Quite a responsibility for a newcomer. Tokayev wished him success in that public service role too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Quite a responsibility for a newcomer. Tokayev wished him success in that public service role too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev also wished Karol Tadeusz Nawrocki success in his responsible public service, and extended wishes of prosperity and well-being to the friendly Polish people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a big moment for Poland—new leadership, new direction maybe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a big moment for Poland-new leadership, new direction maybe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. We'll be watching how this "Poland First" approach plays out internationally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. We'll be watching how this Poland First approach plays out internationally.
